overview: Acme Inc is a leading manufacturer of anvils and other heavy duty tools. They have been in business for over 50 years and supply products to construction and engineering companies worldwide.
123 Designs is a graphic design agency that specializes in branding and marketing materials. They have designed logos and ad campaigns for Fortune 500 companies.
Builders R Us supplies construction tools and materials for home renovation projects. They have a network of retail outlets across the country.
Modern Home Furnishings sells contemporary furniture and home accessories through their retail stores and website. They work directly with designers and manufacturers.
Web Works is a digital marketing agency that helps companies improve their online presence through website design, SEO, and social media marketing.
